column4: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=304131&highlight=xubuntu
How to: Xubuntu - Thunar Native Windows Network Browsing
I wonder if people try to look up answers on their own at all before hopping into irc to ask
chances are 99% of them have been asked and documented already
well i certainly couldnt find an answer for this: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=772650
i google before asking
i cant install themes at all...i even used the svn repo
the only one I know works for sure (as its the onyl one i installed) is this one - http://themes.beryl-project.org/theme_details.php?id=65
cant see it, blank window
if you run emerald-theme-manager from the console, do you see any errors there when you try to import at heme?
tar: /home/crash/.emerald/themes/Vista-Compiz: Cannot chdir: No such file or directory
aha! so is it a tar error?
try to cd into that directory, cd /home/crash/.emerald/themes
i had to sudo make the themes dir, maybe it is to do with write permission problems
tar: ./theme.screenshot.png: Cannot open: Permission denied
that would do it, the permissions
someone else can correct me but I believe it'd be sudo chown crash -R /home/crash/.emerald
nvm i used nautilus :) it works
used nautilus to change the permissions?
yes
thanks for helping!
